person.content:

Paragraph: " Most bites can be prevented by teaching children how to respect a dog , " Michael Cornwell of the Glencoe Animal Hospital in Columbus , Ohio , told the annual meeting of the American Veterinary Medical Association .

|--------|
| Michael Cornwell |
| the American Veterinary Medical Association |

Michael Cornwell is the spokesperson from the Glencoe Animal Hospital in Columbus, Ohio, who spoke at the annual meeting of the American Veterinary Medical Association.

Michael Cornwell is a person who is the spokesperson from the Glencoe Animal Hospital in Columbus, Ohio. He spoke at the annual meeting of the American Veterinary Medical Association, which is also a person in this context represented by the organization it is named after.
